form.name: <input type="text" name="name" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-red-300 shadow-sm focus:border-red-500 focus:ring-red-500" placeholder="Enter your full name" required id="id_name">
form.email: <input type="email" name="email" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-red-300 shadow-sm focus:border-red-500 focus:ring-red-500" placeholder="Enter your email" required id="id_email">
email_errors: An account with this email already exists. Please login instead.
